item.title: Christopher Joy | chrisjoy.asia
item.description: About Christopher Joy (M.A. Area Studies (Southeast Asia) with Distinction, SOAS, University of London is an indepdendent researcher. His research and interests focus on the politics, cultures and political economies of both mainland and island Southeast Asia. His master’s thesis explored the early success of Vietnam’s COVID-19 response in the context of state-society relations. He also holds two Bachelor’s degrees from the University of Pittsburgh. Christopher spent his early career working for both large and small companies as a software & web analyst.
